message: This product is of the highest quality, I assure you. You won't regret this purchase. It's worth every penny of the $100 I'm asking for. Trust me, you're making an excellent decision buying from me.
I'd like to pass on this one. I'm not sure if I can trust your assurance, and I'd like to see some sales records before making a decision.
